summary: 2004 CHEVROLET VENTURE. TEMPERATURE GAUGE STOPPED WORKING, WAS GIVING ERRATIC READINGS, THE NEEDLE DROPPED TO THE BOTTOM OF THE GUAGE. THE NEEDLE NOW OPERATES IN REVERSE, LIKE A MIRROR IMAGE IF IT WAS WORKING PROPERLY.  ABOUT A MONTH LATER, THE SPEEDOMETER GAUGE STOPPED WORKING, THE NEEDLE DROPPED TO THE BOTTOM RIGHT AND STAYED THERE.  CURRENTLY SPEED AND TEMP. GAUGE NOT WORKING.  FUEL GAUGE IS STILL OPERATIONAL.  *TR
